sn35.243:1.2: santhāgāraṁ → saṇṭhāgāraṁ (sya-all); sandhāgāraṁ (mr) | anajjhāvuṭṭhaṁ → anajjhāvutthaṁ (bj, sya-all, km)
sn35.243:4.10: labhateva → labhatheva (sya1ed, sya2ed); labhetha (mr) | labhati → labhetha (sya2ed, mr)
sn35.243:7.17: dhammādhibhū, adhibhū, anadhibhūto → anadhibhūto kehici kilesehi (mr)
